verses.verse: Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> another <S%H3254><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Keturah. <S%H6989><s%>
And she bore <S%H3205><s%> to him Zimran <S%H2175><s%> and Jokshan <S%H3370><s%> and Medan <S%H4091><s%> and Midian <S%H4080><s%> and Ishbak <S%H3435><s%> and Shuah. <S%H7774><s%>

And Jokshan <S%H3370><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Dedan. <S%H1719><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dedan <S%H1719><s%> were Asshurim <S%H9037><s%> and Letushim <S%H3912><s%> and Leummim. <S%H3817><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> [were] Ephah <S%H5891><s%> and Epher <S%H6081><s%> and Hanoch <S%H2585><s%> and Abida <S%H28><s%> and Eldaah. <S%H420><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah. <S%H6989><s%>
Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he had to Isaac; <S%H3327><s%>

but to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of his concubines, <S%H6370><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> while he was still <S%H5750><s%> living, <S%H2416><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> them away <S%H7971><s%> from his son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> eastward, <S%H9506><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are all <S%H3117><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of Abraham's life <S%H9132><s%> that he lived, <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seventy-five years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> breathed <S%H1478><s%> his last <S%H1478><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> in a ripe <S%H2896><s%> old <S%H7872><s%> age, <S%H7872><s%> an old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H2205><s%> and satisfied <S%H7649><s%> [with life;] and he was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people. <S%H9415><s%>

Then his sons <S%H1121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Machpelah, <S%H4375><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zohar <S%H6714><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> facing <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Mamre, <S%H4471><s%>

the field <S%H7704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> purchased <S%H7069><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth; <S%H2845><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> was buried <S%H6912><s%> with Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife. <S%H802><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac; <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> by Beer-lahai-roi.

Now these <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> the Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> Sarah's maid, <S%H8198><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to Abraham;

and these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> by their names, <S%H8034><s%> in the order <S%H8435><s%> of their birth: <S%H8435><s%> Nebaioth, <S%H5032><s%> the first-born of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> and Kedar <S%H6938><s%> and Adbeel <S%H110><s%> and Mibsam <S%H4017><s%>
and Mishma <S%H4927><s%> and Dumah <S%H1746><s%> and Massa, <S%H4854><s%>
Hadad <S%H2301><s%> and Tema, <S%H8485><s%> Jetur, <S%H3195><s%> Naphish <S%H5305><s%> and Kedemah. <S%H6929><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are their names, <S%H8034><s%> by their villages, <S%H9161><s%> and by their camps; <S%H2918><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> according to their tribes. <S%H523><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H9132><s%> of Ishmael, <S%H3458><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty-seven years; <S%H8141><s%> and he breathed <S%H1478><s%> his last <S%H1478><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people. <S%H9415><s%>

And they settled <S%H7931><s%> from Havilah <S%H2341><s%> to Shur <S%H7793><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is east <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> as one goes <S%H935><s%> toward Assyria; <S%H804><s%> he settled <S%H5307><s%> in defiance <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his relatives. <S%H251><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s son: <S%H1121><s%> Abraham became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Isaac; <S%H3327><s%>

and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he took <S%H3947><s%> Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Aramean <S%H761><s%> of Paddan-aram, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Aramean, <S%H761><s%> to be his wife. <S%H802><s%>

And Isaac <S%H3327><s%> prayed <S%H6279><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> on behalf <S%H5227><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> she was barren; <S%H6135><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6279><s%> him and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> conceived. <S%H2029><s%>

But the children <S%H1121><s%> struggled <S%H7533><s%> together within <S%H7130><s%> her; and she said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> it is so, <S%H3651><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> then am I [this way?]" So she went <S%H1980><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are in your womb; <S%H990><s%> And two <S%H8147><s%> peoples <S%H3816><s%> shall be separated <S%H6504><s%> from your body; <S%H4578><s%> And one people <S%H3816><s%> shall be stronger <S%H553><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the other; <S%H3816><s%> And the older <S%H7227><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the younger. <S%H6810><s%>"
When her days <S%H3117><s%> to be delivered <S%H3205><s%> were fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> there were twins <S%H9639><s%> in her womb. <S%H990><s%>

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> red, <S%H132><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> over like a hairy <S%H8181><s%> garment; <S%H155><s%> and they named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Esau. <S%H6215><s%>

And afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with his hand <S%H3027><s%> holding <S%H270><s%> on to Esau's heel, <S%H6119><s%> so his name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> was sixty <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when she gave <S%H3205><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to them.

When the boys <S%H5288><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> up, Esau <S%H6215><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> a skillful <S%H3045><s%> hunter, <S%H376><s%> <S%H6718><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of the field; <S%H7704><s%> but Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was a peaceful <S%H8535><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> living <S%H3427><s%> in tents. <S%H168><s%>

Now Isaac <S%H3327><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he had a taste <S%H6310><s%> for game; <S%H6718><s%> but Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
And when Jacob <S%H3290><s%> had cooked <S%H2102><s%> stew, <S%H5138><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in from the field <S%H7704><s%> and he was famished; <S%H5889><s%>

and Esau <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let me have <S%H3938><s%> a swallow <S%H3938><s%> of that red <S%H122><s%> stuff <S%H123><s%> there, for I am famished. <S%H5889><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Edom. <S%H9000><s%>
But Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "First <S%H3117><s%> sell <S%H4376><s%> me your birthright. <S%H1062><s%>"

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H1980><s%> about <S%H1980><s%> to die; <S%H4191><s%> so of what <S%H4100><s%> [use] then is the birthright <S%H1062><s%> to me?"

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "First <S%H3117><s%> swear <S%H7650><s%> to me"; so he swore <S%H7650><s%> to him, and sold <S%H4376><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%> to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and lentil <S%H5742><s%> stew; <S%H5138><s%> and he ate <S%H398><s%> and drank, <S%H8354><s%> and rose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> on his way. <S%H1980><s%> Thus Esau <S%H6215><s%> despised <S%H959><s%> his birthright. <S%H1062><s%>
